Makes 2 pies

Millionaire Pie

Ingredients

  • 1 can sweetened condensed milk
  • 16 oz. crushed pineapple (drained)
  • 1Â½ cups chopped pecans
  • 16 oz. Cool Whip
  • 6 Tbs. real lemon
  • 2 graham cracker crusts

Instructions

  1. Mix all ingredients and pour into graham cracker crusts and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.

Desserts
